message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.NE 

This paper proposes a new framework for multi-task learning that aims to balance the difficulty levels of different tasks. The paper discusses various existing approaches and their limitations. The proposed framework is very simple and can be combined with most multi-task learning models. The paper includes empirical studies to demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed approach. Based on this information, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision and pattern recognition (cs.CV), computation and language (cs.CL), and neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE).
